title: Looking for an ADC for a serious Ranked 5's team (Trying to go to the Oceanic Challenger Series)
body:
Hey guys, we are The Knights, a starting/building e-Sports team, hoping to go to the Oceanic Challenger Series. Before I go into detail about the positions and such, we are looking for dedicated and serious members - people with the same passion as me to go to OCS, or even opL if we're really good. You need to be able and willing to participate in weekend training sessions, team chats, and creation of League plays. Basically, you need to have tons of time on the weekend (just a couple of hours in the early stages) to be willing to do some team training. You should also be able to play pro picks. 

Update to this: We are now multiple weeks in and are established. Saiclone, an awesome coach has prepared multiple drills and we have spreadsheets of team training to help us continue growing. 

Additionally, you will need to have:

Skype
At least Level 30 (for the ranked team)
Willingness to train and improve
YOU MUST BE WILLING TO PLAY SATURDAY AND SUNDAY GAMES AND MEET ON TIME. IF YOU DO NOT ATTEND THREE WITHOUT A VALID REASON, YOU'RE OUT. WE ARE A SERIOUS TEAM LOOKING FOR SERIOUS COMPETITIVE PLAY. TRAINING SESSIONS INCLUDED.
A calm head - you must not get mad at your teammates
Time
Skill (this can always improve) and flexibility with champions at your main role
Our current and developing team roster is:

Coach: Saiclone (Analyst for the Dire Wolves opL team, they came third). Awesome, eh? (Diamond IV, but he'll be able to teach us professional Oceanic League play)


Top: Stenelen (Platinum V)
Mid: Cloudy Days (Diamond V)
Jungle: Dom1nAtAr (Gold III) 
Support: AnonymousDiamond - That's me :). (Gold V)
ADC: IN NEED

Substitute 1 ADC/Support: Stenelen (Platinum V, Support) Voxel (Diamond IV peaked Diamond III, ADC)
Substitute 2 Mid: RhinoViru5 (Platinum V)
Substitute 3 Top: MLG Jono (Platinum V)
Substitute 4 Jungle: MLG Jono (Platinum V)

Put your application in the comments, according to this little draft:

Summoner ID:
Rank (We will review your account to see if you are quite good even if you're at a low rank, but higher ranks will have higher chance):
Hours which can be played over the weekends:
Age (Doesn't matter a single ounce, but you can't be 11 and play for us, 13+ is good):
Skype:
First Name:
Preferred Role:
Champions Played In Said Role:
How can I trust you to be dedicated:

Good luck on the battle field, summoners! 

I will attempt to reply to every post - do not expect an instant reply. I have to review all summoners first, and make a choice!
